questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to rescue Sanji from a political marriage, involving a battle against the Big Mom Pirates. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This ability, possessed by a character known as 'The Phoenix,' allows for regenerative powers. What is...?
questions.answer: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix

questions.question: This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
